title: Chicago Humanities Festival: Panel—Hairy Who
hero_caption: Gladys Nilsson. The Great War of the Wonder Women, n.d. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Edwin A. Bergman © Gladys Nilsson.
short_description: Featuring artists Jim Falconer, Art Green, Gladys Nilsson, Jim Nutt, and Suellen Rocca
list_description: Featuring artists Jim Falconer, Art Green, Gladys Nilsson, Jim Nutt, and Suellen Rocca
description:
Join artists Jim Falconer, Art Green, Gladys Nilsson, Jim Nutt, and Suellen Rocca—who exhibited together as the Hairy Who in the late 1960s—to explore the history and influence of their renowned exhibition group. Scholar Jennifer Gross leads the conversation. This program is presented on the occasion of the exhibition Hairy Who? 1966–1969.

Visit chicagohumanities.org for more information or to purchase tickets.

Art Institute of Chicago members receive a special discounted ticket price for this lecture in addition to the lectures Jerry Saltz: The Art World Problem and Manga and Ukiyo-e. To purchase discounted tickets for members, visit chicagohumanities.org and enter the promo code AICMEM2018.
